relevant_findings.lungs: CTAB, normal excursion, no respiratory distress
relevant_findings.abdomen: soft, mildly tender to palpation in the epigastrium
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, no CCE, no tenderness, 2+ B

relevant_findings.liver: diffusely echogenic, consistent with hepatic steatosis, smooth contour, no focal liver mass, main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow, no ascites
relevant_findings.bile_ducts: no intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 4 mm
relevant_findings.gallbladder: sludge and tiny stones seen, gallbladder polyps measuring up to 1.0 cm, unchanged
relevant_findings.pancreas: within normal limits, no masses or ductal dilation
relevant_findings.kidneys: no gross abnormality in the right kidney
relevant_findings.retroperitoneum: no gross abnormality in the IVC
